stack:stack.stack:script:
if [ ! -d /mnt/cdrom ]; then mkdir -p /mnt/cdrom fi
mkdir -p /export/stack/carts chown root:apache /export/stack/carts chmod 775 /export/stack/carts
/usr/bin/systemctl enable ludicrous-server /usr/bin/systemctl start ludicrous-server
/usr/bin/systemctl disable wickedd-dhcp4.service /usr/bin/systemctl disable wickedd-dhcp6.service
rm -f /usr/lib/systemd/system/wickedd-dhcp4.service rm -f /usr/lib/systemd/system/wickedd-dhcp6.service
